item.title: Plesk 11 Upgrade Unable to run Perl scripts in cgi-bin
item.author: Eric Simmerman
item.description: After an upgrade to Plesk 11, my Perl scripts located under cgi-bin/ for a specific domain were not executing properly.

item.title: Import GnuCash data into MoneyDance
item.author: Eric Simmerman
item.description: GnuCash served me well while I was running Ubuntu as my primary desktop but since moving to a Mac Pro I've been disappointed in the performance and non-native nature of the GnuCash Mac port.
